solution_line_template: There are {num_packs} packs of tennis balls while each pack has {balls_per_pack} balls. {num_packs} * {balls_per_pack} = <<{num_packs}*{balls_per_pack}={total_balls}>>{total_balls} balls
Melissa spent a total of ${total_cost} for a total of {total_balls} balls. ${total_cost} / {total_balls} = $<<{total_cost}/{total_balls}={cost_per_ball}>>{cost_per_ball} per ball
